string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: Does it really maters to you?
Kotlin coroutines streamline asynchronous programming, making common tasks like network calls and database updates simple and performant.
Android is modern UI toolkit is built on Kotlin, allowing you to create UI quickly with powerful and intuitive APIs.
With nullability included in its type system, Kotlin helps you avoid NullPointerExceptions. Android apps that use Kotlin are 20%% less likely to crash.
Kotlin is modern language features allow you to focus on expressing your ideas and write less boilerplate code.
